mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A synopsis of the genus Hydriastele (Arecaceae)

nomenclature.name: Hydriastele wendlandiana
nomenclature.author: (F. Muell.) H. Wendl. & Drude
nomenclature.type: Australia, Northern Territory, Liverpool R.; Gulliver; s.n.

synonymy.name: Hydriastele wendlandiana var. microcarpa
synonymy.author: H. Wendl. & Drude
synonymy.type: Australia, Queensland, O’Connell R.; Nernst; s.n.

synonymy.name: Hydriastele douglasiana
synonymy.author: F. M. Bailey
synonymy.bibref: F. M. Bailey, Queensland Agric. J. 1: 232 (1897)
synonymy.type: Australia, Queensland, Cape York Peninsula, Somerset, Polo Creek; Jardine; s.n.

div.p: The type of Hydriastele douglasiana F. M. Bailey was collected for Bailey by Jardine, but the material marked as the type in Brisbane is labelled as F. M. Bailey 18. Further examination of the material in Brisbane is required to confirm that the two alternative citations represent the same collection.
